alert.note: Alert for Inland Jefferson; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 25 at 10:54AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Jefferson and eastern Leon Counties through 1145 AM EST... At 1053 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 14 miles east of Havana to 8 miles east of Tallahassee. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Monticello, Tallahassee, Alma, Ralford Greenway, Miccosukee, Drifton, Killearn Estates, Casa Blanco, Chaires, Pisgah Church, Lake Miccosukee, Fincher, Apalachee Regional Park, Chaires Crossroads, Festus, Lake Iamonia, Baum, Lois, Killearn Lakes and Capitola. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until noon EST for Big Bend of Florida.
